content: **size** ~37 x 37 you can make this blanket any size you desire from small to very large **yarn** i recommend any self-striping yarn this project works particularly well with caron cakes but you can also work it up using lion brand ice cream etc the chevron effect will vary depending on the length of the stripes in the yarn if you want to color control the join as you go effect could also be used with individual colors for more structured chevrons for my original project i used caron cinnamon swirl cake in the color mai tai **materials** size i or j crochet hook yarn needle scissors **skill level*** beginner **written pattern** visit my website to get the free written pattern https //craftinginthenight com/sunset-dreams-baby-blanket/ free video tutorial on youtube here https //www youtube com/watch v=_eiufom2vag ** connect with me ** join the free facebook group and share your makes https //www facebook com/groups/1172620876735116 subscribe for video updates on youtube https //www youtube com/@craftinginthenight bookmark the website https //craftinginthenight com **credit & sharing** feel free to use this pattern to create items for sale however please do tag me on any social media posts and give credit for the design please always refer friends directly to my youtube or website to get their own copy of the pattern © 2024 designed by april lee crafting in the night all rights reserved
